lines.text: Knight Rider, a shadowy flight into the dangerous world of a man who does not exist. Michael Knight, a young loner on a crusade to champion the cause of the innocent, the helpless, the powerless, in a world of criminals who operate above the law.

[repeated line in the series, while using KITT's video monitor]
Yo, Devon!

[repeated line in the series, speaking to KITT]
Keep your scanners peeled.
Michael Knight, a lone crusader in a dangerous world. The world... of the Knight Rider.
